title: Application was unable to start correctly
body:
Tried to open league, message pops up with and says "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000006). Click OK to close the application"

Any solutions or advice regarding this?

Thanx

replies.body: It almost sounds like this might be some kind of weird permissions error so be sure to adjust those really quickly with the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) just in case your OS is blocking League from opening correctly. I'd also be sure to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) just in case something else is getting in the way.
